QAPair.Question: What is (are) Tay-Sachs - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on Tay-Sachs disease : Genetic and Rare Diseases Information Center -- rarediseases.info.nih.gov/diseases/7737/tay-sachs-disease , National Human Genome Research Institute -- www.genome.gov/Genetic-Disorders/Tay-Sachs-Disease , National Organization for Rare Disorders -- rarediseases.org/rare-diseases/tay-sachs-disease/ , National Tay-Sachs & Allied Diseases Association -- ntsad.org , US National Library of Medicine, Medline Plus -- medlineplus.gov/genetics/condition/tay-sachs-disease/ ,
